mapper.select: SELECT i.itemid, i.cateid AS top_cate, cat.name AS cate_name, i.name, i.price, po.color AS po_color, po.size AS po_size, po.stock AS po_stock, s.sellerid FROM item i INNER JOIN cate cat ON i.cateid = cat.cateid INNER JOIN seller s ON i.sellerid = s.sellerid INNER JOIN product_option po ON i.itemid = po.itemid INNER JOIN order_detail od ON i.itemid = od.itemid WHERE i.itemid = #{itemid} AND po.color = od.color
